did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization home economics publications, 1960-1988.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Publications relating to the work of FAO and other organizations. Subjects include home economics, planning, child care, food and nutrition, textiles and clothing, consumer education, the role of women, and family issues, particularly in Africa.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Ludmilla A. Marin (Jenkins) was the head of Home Economics for FAO.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Publications relating to the work of FAO and other organizations. Subjects include home economics, planning, child care, food and nutrition, textiles and clothing, consumer education, the role of women, and family issues, particularly in Africa.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations
United Nations. Food and Agriculture Organization.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization Home Economics Publications, #4910. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
